scripts.dev: npm run copy & npm run docs:dev
scripts.copy: npm run copy:react-ui & npm run copy:vue-eslint & npm run copy:react-eslint & copy:react-hooks
scripts.copy:react-ui: rimraf site-docs/react-ui && mk copy packages/react-ui/src/**/**/*.md -o site-docs/reactui -w
scripts.copy:vue-eslint: rimraf site-docs/vue-eslint && mk copy packages/vue-eslint/**/*.md -o site-docs/vueeslint -w
scripts.copy:react-eslint: rimraf site-docs/react-eslint && mk copy packages/react-eslint/**/*.md -o site-docs/reacteslint -w
scripts.copy:react-hooks: rimraf site-docs/react-hooks && mk copy packages/react-hooks/src/**/**/*.md -o site-docs/reacthooks -w
